npc_output: Not much, just trying to stay dry in this hail. Want to hear a joke? |r1|
Good, thanks! Just waiting for the hail to pass. I have a parcel to deliver |r1|
We have some nice hunting gear on sale, but I'm a bit tired after the long night. Maybe you can help me with something?
Actually, I was thinking of cooking something special tonight. Care to join me? |r3|
Love to! But maybe we should wait until the festival? I have a few tricks up my sleeve |r2|
It's been tough lately, but I'm hoping to catch something big soon. Want to come with me?
We have a great feast prepared, and I can pour you a drink. Would you like that?
I'd love to! How about a little song to brighten up the evening? |r2|
Just trying to stay positive, despite the rain. Want to hear a joke to lift your spirits? |r1|
Actually, I have a message to deliver. Can you help me with that? |r1|
